DOC.brief_summary: This study is planned to evaluate the safety and efficacy of L059 (levetiracetam) in long-term administration in patients who completed N01020 [NCT00160165] or N01221 [NCT00280696].
DOC.brief_title: A Long Term Follow up Administration Study of L059 (Levetiracetam) in Epilepsy Patients With Partial Onset Seizures
DOC.criteria: Patients who participated in study N01221 [NCT00280696] and completed the evaluation period and transition period or patients who participated in study N01020 [NCT00160615] Female patients during pregnancy, delivery and lactation, or suspected of pregnancy
